original_text: For a long time, the Israelites did not serve the true God. They did not have any priests to teach them what was right. They did not know God's law.
korean_text: 이스라엘에는 참 신이 없고 가르치는 제사장도 없고 율법도 없은 지가 오래 되었으나

sentences.original_text: the Israelites did not serve the true God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 참 하나님을 섬기지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did not have any priests
to teach them what was right.
They did not know God's law.
